definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: Having a perfect cabinet is a wonderful thing.
sentences.chinese: 拥有一套完美的橱柜是一件妙不可言的事。

sentences.english: It was a lovely dinner-party of fourteen.
sentences.chinese: 当天的宴会妙不可言，席上一共有十四个人。

sentences.english: It sure is wonderful to be here with my friend!
sentences.chinese: 和我的朋友在一起简直就是妙不可言。

sentences.english: In the meantime, they say that falling in love is wonderful, and that the best is falling in love with what you have.
sentences.chinese: 有人说恋爱的感觉妙不可言，但最好还是比着脚买鞋。

sentences.english: Under the moonlight, gold Hydrangea is fantastic.
sentences.chinese: 月光下，金绣球更是妙不可言。

sentences.english: Waist breeze waves brought about by the feeling, fantastic.
sentences.chinese: 腰间吹过所带来的一阵阵的感觉，妙不可言。

sentences.english: Inconceivable and unutterable were the wonderful and astonishing actions which he performed for the bebefit of his chief disciples.
sentences.chinese: 他教化他的主要弟子的事迹令人称奇，妙不可言。

sentences.english: Beautiful scenery but meal, elegance but drink, have ulterior motives, too wonderful for words.
sentences.chinese: 秀色可餐，优雅可饮，醉翁之意，妙不可言。

sentences.english: This experience is liberation; in it there is inexpressible joy.
sentences.chinese: 这种体验就是自由，在里面有妙不可言的喜悦。

sentences.english: His new play has a certain je ne sais quoi.
sentences.chinese: 他的这出新戏有些地方真是妙不可言。

sentences.english: All the iris have popped open, and the smell is sheer heaven.
sentences.chinese: 所有的蝴蝶花全盛开了，那股香味简直妙不可言。

sentences.english: If you manage to do something that you’ve never done before, you would have achieved something amazing that day.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意做一些你从未做过的，那一天将妙不可言。

definition: leaving a rich aftertaste/(fig.) memorable/lingering in memory
fate or chance that brings people together/predestined affinity or relationship/(Budd.) destiny
string of pearl and jade (idiom); ideal combination/perfect pair
want to stop but can't (idiom)/to be unable to stop oneself/to feel an urge to continue
can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); mysterious and subtle
pinyin: zhi3 ke3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2

definition: to regret not having met earlier (idiom); It is nice to meet you finally./It feels like we have known each other all along.
